entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 11:44 PM MDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Periods of light snow beginning near noon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:44 PM MDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 8.
